title: Inquire About a Property Lien
description: A citizen is buying a property and wants to check if there are any outstanding government liens (e.g., for unpaid taxes or water bills).

tasks.description: Gather the property address or parcel number.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent gets the identifier for the property.

tasks.description: Search across multiple systems (tax, utilities) for any outstanding liens on the property.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent searches and finds an outstanding lien for an unpaid water bill.

tasks.description: Provide the details of any found liens to the citizen.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent informs the citizen about the water bill lien and the amount owed.
